typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EID as short,
		EName as string,
		ESalary as short,
		EAddress as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source1 derive(Insert_date = currentTimestamp(),
		Amount = ESalary,
		Upper_Name = upper(EName)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		EID as string,
		EName as string,
		ESalary as string,
		EAddress as string,
		Upper_Name as string,
		Salary_1 as integer,
		Insert_date as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		EID,
		EName,
		ESalary,
		EAddress,
		Upper_Name,
		Salary_1 = Amount,
		Insert_date
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
